    • About Brandi Adkins


    Brandi Adkins is the owner of Adkins Real Estate Group. For the last 15 years, she has pursued her passion of helping put Austinites in homes that they love. Adkins Real Estate Group is a dynamic and engaging boutique real estate firm in the Austin area. They have faithfully served clients and grown their business through satisfied client referrals. They work hard to inform, educate, and protect their clients through the entire real estate transaction. This client-centric approach has enabled them to build a successful referral-based business, creating and sustaining relationships with the hundreds of families they have helped buy and sell homes.
